title: Project Manager or Business Analyst for a Major Investment Bank at Mitchell Martin (New York City, NY)
text: Source: eFinancial Careers A new direct-with-manager roles has opened up with a major financial client we are working with in Manhattan. The manager is looking to hire right away for these long term contract. We currently have 2 consultants on this team. He is searching for a PM/BA. This is a role for someone with trading systems and capital markets experience. You should have strong work flow process experience. This is a hot team and we are working directly with the manager! The role can pay between $700 and $900 per day depending on experience, background, how you need to be paid and what you're currently being paid. If this role is not a fit or this range does not apply to you can be a part of our generous referral program. For consulting placements we pay up to $1,000 and for permanent placements we pay up to $2,500 after 90 days of work. If you are interested in finding out more please email me at alexc@itmmi.com with a copy of your updated resume and contact number where you can be reached. Project Manager or Business Analyst for a capital markets change control team at a major I-Bank in Manhattan
